animeDescription: "Your intuition will be tickled"Will the two be able to become idols!?Anime's first documentary variety show challenging how far two virtual idols are able to grow!!!It's a live broadcast, so what will happen is unknown!It's a live broadcast, so your voice will reach the two!Furthermore, simulaneous delivery in both Japan and China!Your participation in the program will bring up the two idols!(Source: Official Website)
animeRelated: ['Side story: Minarai Diva', 'Sequel: Chokkan × Algorhythm♪ 2nd Season']
